body.para: Thanks for the report shovelhead, that works fine for me I've imported a few thousand images and they get copied into the right folder as year/month/day into the Photos directory, Could you please try with another new user created on your system and report back? thanks in advance.
** Changed in: f-spot (Ubuntu) Importance: Undecided => Low
** Changed in: f-spot (Ubuntu) Status: New => Incomplete
** Changed in: f-spot (Ubuntu) Assignee: (unassigned) => Ubuntu Desktop Bugs (desktop-bugs)
body.footer: -- F-Spot lost the folder structure in 9.04 https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/367830 You received this bug notification because you are a member of MOTU Mono Team, which is subscribed to f-spot in ubuntu.
